abstract.t: This memo describes measurement in order to accomplish TrafficEngineering (TE) in IP networks. This document will aid vendors intheir choice of information to provide; it will assist networkoperators in determining the appropriate information to request; andwill demonstrate how measurements are used to accomplish TE. Theobjective of this memo is to describe TE measurement. This memowill also describe (in brief) some methods for using the variablesand some methods for gathering the information.
